entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [netstandard2.1] Enum.GetValues gap #99488
  • CLR_GCHEAPCOLLECT_KEYWORD triggers a GC twice #99487
  • Q: Is building the CoreCLR runtime on Unix supported with FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE disabled? #99484
  • SignalRClientTests fail with "PlaywrightException: Target closed" #99483
  • [Mono] Handle resurrection for marshalled delegates #99478
  • DEREF_AFTER_NULL in /src/coreclr/jit/fgopt.cpp #99476
  • SDL signoff requirements - enable MSVC warning C4242 (libunwind) #99471

Closed

  • What be the best way to read text file that was written using Encoding.Default in .NET Framework #99486

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][jit] Optimize JIT time on platforms without SIMD support. #99485
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Show the VMR commit hash in dotnet --info #99482
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99475
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [release/7.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99474
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99473
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99472
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Enable most SDL-required C/C++ warnings #99470
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove ref assembly code from CodeQL scans #99469
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Delete stale comment #99477
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Delegate bug fixes #99185
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][wbt] Extend delay when waiting for URLs #99446
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Reenable test on s390x in tests.proj #99453
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • NativeAOT: Add win-x86 support #99372
    arch-x86, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Add data stream library #99442
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement Swift lowering algorithm in the CoreCLR type system #99438
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • JIT: inline shared generics with runtime lookups inside #99265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Share EventSource QCall definitions between NAOT and CoreCLR #99441
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [CoreCLR and native AOT] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` supports generic attributes #99468
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] dedicated io thread #99422
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Revert "[wasm] Disable the System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript tests on mt whi…" #99000
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add pred block iterator that tolerates pred list modifications #99466
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Shipping internal package for webcil #99380
    area-Build-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Enable 'compile-in-child' aot mode on ios. #99390
    area-Build-mono
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [release/6.0] Add missing Evidence types to AcccessControl NETFramework Facade #99462
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • [mono] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #99449
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios
  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Initialize native layout info for small structs during type load #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • sdk 8.0.201-1 not in ubuntu feed #39352

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • INamedTypeSymbol.Constructors - Method sometimes fails to return information for private constructors #72473

Closed

  • `this` keyword for extension method not recommended in partial declaration of static class without `static` modifier #72468
  • Question: Is there a way to abort a running CSharpScript? #14144
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Code fix Convert to regular constructor for class without body #72475
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update NuGet-packages.md #72474
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Onboard VB intellisense page to Unified Settings #72471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Remove portions of solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bind extensions in initializers of inferred locals #72398
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation and Add method with params array #72469
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use the List(int) constructor if possible when lowering collection expressions #72427
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mvc #54462
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Session.DistributedSession Session cache read exception #54460
  • TryValidateModel expects all object fields to be required #54459
  • Add IsComposing Property to KeyboardEventArgs #54456
  • State management needs to support transition between Server and WebAssembly models in Web Apps #54455

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54419
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, plaintext #54426
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, fortunes, mvc #54428
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #54458
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #54430
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #54337
  • Perf regression: fortunes #54420
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #54425

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the VMR commit hash in .version #54461
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add IsComposing Property to KeyboardEventArgs Classes #54457
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-09
entry.content:

  • TableView TextCell command executes only once #21112
  • Please add Combo Box to .Net Maui #21111

Closed

  • [Enhancement] Add ToolTip and ToolTipPlacement properties #1889

PullRequests

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
